resources.string: A Care Guide for Mothers of Premature Babies
The tutorial source is the "Born too soon" and "Retinopathy of Prematurity" publications by the American EyeCare Project
Now that you are aware of ROP, please take this small survey
Did you know about the risks of premature birth before viewing this tutorial?
Was this tutorial helpful to you?
Which of these fits you more?
You are expecting a child and want to be prepared
You currently have a premature newborn and care about his/her health
You know someone with Retinopathy (ROP) and want to learn more about the disease
